body.p: Python uses variables to store data values. Python supports various data types, including integers, floats, strings, Booleans, and more. Variables allow us to store and manipulate data in our programs. Python is dynamically typed, which means that you don't need to declare a variable's type explicitly. Python determines the type based on the value assigned to it.
